[[inst_hl_casw]]
==== HL.CASW

*Syntax:* hl.casw<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, SrcD, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Compare and Swap: atomic 32-bit compare-and-swap operation.

*Group:* AMO/CAS
